headline: Introducing the Workers Cache API: Giving you control over how your content is cached
keywords: Cloudflare Workers, Serverless, Cache, Speed & Reliability, JavaScript, Developers
description: At Cloudflare, we aim to make the Internet faster and safer for everyone. One way we do this is through caching: we keep a copy of our customer content in our 165 data centers around the world. This brings content  closer to users and reduces traffic back to origin servers.
